author: quark2
body:
#### PR description:
On PR #36230 @perrotta pointed a lot of stuff which are not suitable for the CMSSW convention and buggy, but unfortunately, the PR merged without the fix on the comments. This is the hotfix.

#### PR validation:
Tests are done and one can check again by `runTheMatrix` workflows

@jshlee @watson-ij
title: Modification on r-phi distribution plots and fix on under/overflow bins in GEM onlineDQM (continue)
